thread.title: Kroger Earnings: What to Watch

author: Heather Haddon
title: Kroger Earnings: What to Watch
text:
Kroger Co., the U.S.’s largest supermarket chain, is scheduled to report fourth-quarter results before the market opens Thursday. Here is what you need to know:
EARNINGS FORECAST: Analysts polled by Thomson Reuters expect earnings per share of 63 cents, up from Kroger’s year-ago earnings of 53 cents a share.
